• Castor et Pollux (1737 version) Concentus Musicus Wien, Harnoncourt (Teldec, 1972)[15]
  • Castor et Pollux (1737 version) Les Arts Florissants, William Christie (Harmonia Mundi, 1993))[16]
  • Castor et Pollux (1754 version) English Bach Festival Singers and Orchestra, Farncombe (Erato, 1982)[17]
  • Castor et Pollux (1754 version) Aradia Ensemble; Opera in Concert Chorus, Kevin Mallon (Naxos, 2004)[18]
  • Castor et Pollux (1754 version) Les Talens Lyriques, Chorus of De Nederlandse Opera, Christophe Rousset (Opus Arte, 2008)[19]
  • Castor et Pollux (1754 version) Ensemble Pygmalion, Raphaël Pichon (Hamonia Mundi, 2015)
